name: Sky Dash-Endless Roller
description:
Sky Dash-Endless Roller is a much waited fast pace game for kids and adults. A perfect Ball Runner game for kids above nine years of age, it follows an adventure genre, which will give rise to adrenaline rush more than usual. You have to make ways for a clear path to reach your goal and win the game.
These static blocks of such Sky rush game will start moving on the path to stop players from reaching their goals. With these blocks, you can even experience some breath taking view of such Rolling Sky games, full of creatures, trying hard to stop you from your mission.
